snippet: The recently lauded pianist Matt Mitchell played a set with Chris Tordini and Dan Weiss on Thursday night as part of the Sound It Out series at Greenwich House.
abstract: Nate Chinen reviews performance by the Matt Mitchell Trio as part of the Sound It Out jazz concert series at Greenwich House.
lead_paragraph: The recently lauded pianist Matt Mitchell played a set with Chris Tordini and Dan Weiss on Thursday night as part of the Sound It Out series at Greenwich House.

headline.print_headline: New Compositions From a Trio Propelled by Piano
headline.seo: Matt Mitchell, With Trio, at Greenwich House
headline.main: New Compositions From a Trio Propelled by Piano
